attributes.action: Get the Royal Mail to clamp down on Fentanyl coming in from China.
attributes.background: The Opioid epidemic is ravaging the US and killing tens of thousands of people every year. For that reason we need to make sure that this drug does not spread to the UK. The Royal Mail must be much more vigilant on packages coming in from China where most of the illegal Fentanyl is coming from.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the Royal Mail and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling for extra funding for UK customs staff to reduce the level of Fentanyl entering the UK illegally if that is something you would like to see happen.
